title: a) Roads and Bridges, Railway, Ropeway, Underground Pipelines, Cables and like purpose in any zone
clause_text: a) Roads and Bridges, Railway, Ropeway, Underground Pipelines, Cables and like purpose in any zone. If any Road / Ring road / Express way declared by the State or Central Highway Authority, the alignment of such declared road shall deemed to be the part of the Regional Plan and for this, procedure under section 20 of the M.R. & T.P Act, 1966 shall not be necessary.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
